name: Crown Industries, Inc. v. Schwartz (et al., Appellant)

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Crown Industries, Inc. v. Schwartz (et al., Appellant).

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Reuben Miller, with him Blank, Rudenko, Klaus & Rome, for appellant.
I. Raymond Kremer, with him Louis II. BUfkin, and Katz, BUfkin & Greenberg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Crown Industries, Inc. v. Schwartz (et al., Appellant).
Argued January 12, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
March 16, 1965:
Reuben Miller, with him Blank, Rudenko, Klaus & Rome, for appellant.
I. Raymond Kremer, with him Louis II. BUfkin, and Katz, BUfkin & Greenberg, for appellee.
